definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Maine is the only state that has a one-syllable name.
sentences.chinese: 缅因州是唯一一个单音节名字的州县。

sentences.english: Monosyllabic loanwords constitute only a small proportion of the Chinese loanwords.
sentences.chinese: 汉语借词中，单音节外来词只占一小部分。

sentences.english: A single-syllable word can have several meanings depending on how it is intoned .
sentences.chinese: 一个单音节的字，依声调的不同，可以有几种意思。

sentences.english: The paper concluded that single-syllable adjectives may connect with object, especially in the Chinese prevailing in the early Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 笔者认为先秦汉语单音节形容词是可以带宾语的。

sentences.english: Opened mouth wouldn't even monosyllabic name cleanly.
sentences.chinese: 张了张嘴连单音节也没法利落地说出。

sentences.english: Monosyllabic adverbs in modern Chinese can be reduplicated.
sentences.chinese: 现代汉语单音节副词可以重叠。

sentences.english: Secondly, we study specifically the auxiliary verbs in Zhu Zi Yu Nei.
sentences.chinese: 其次，具体分析了《朱子语类》中的单音节助动词。

sentences.english: Chapter IV discussed the monosyllabic verb and two-syllable verb in detail about"Yizhoushu"Verbs.
sentences.chinese: 第四章分述《逸周书》中的单音节动词和双音节动词。

sentences.english: Such reduplicated adverbs fall into three types.
sentences.chinese: 单音节重叠副词可分为三类。

sentences.english: These make the historic study of single syllable language possible.
sentences.chinese: 这样，单音节语的历史研究才成为可能。

sentences.english: Certain one-syllable prefixes usually have secondary stress.
sentences.chinese: 有些单音节前缀通常用次重音念。

sentences.english: It is the major tendency for the development of Chinese words that a monosyllabic word becomes disyllabic and polysyllabic.
sentences.chinese: 单音节词复音化是汉语词汇发展的重要规律之一。

sentences.english: The foreword makes an overall review of a brief introduction to the hand verbs;
sentences.chinese: 第一章是对单音节持具类手部动词进行界定。

sentences.english: Liheci is a kind of intermediate state that Chinese word is evolved from the monosyllable to the compound state.
sentences.chinese: 离合词是汉语词由单音节向双音节过渡的中间状态。

sentences.english: The following one-syllable prefixes are usually unstressed .
sentences.chinese: 以下的单音节前缀通常不重读。

sentences.english: The candidate was too shy to talk and only provide one-word answer.
sentences.chinese: 他害羞到讲不出话来，说话也基本上都是单音节的。

definition: the final of a Chinese syllable (the component of a syllable remaining after removal of the initial consonant, if any, and the tone, e.g. the final of "niáng" is "iang")
polysyllabic word/Chinese word made up of three or more characters
single Chinese character/word (in a foreign language)
consonant/the initial consonant (of a Chinese syllable)
